_comment: Manual metadata to merge with auto-generated registry. Keys are command names.

list ls.whenToUse: Find list IDs by name. Use before list export or field ls.

list get.whenToUse: Get list details including type and field count.

list export.whenToUse: Get entries from a list. Use --filter for field-based filtering (e.g., 'Status="New"'). Use --saved-view only for pre-configured Affinity views (check xaffinity://saved-views/{listId}). Note: saved view names are NOT field values.

list-entry get.whenToUse: Get full details for a single list entry by ID.

company ls.whenToUse: List or search ALL companies in CRM. Use --query for text search (name, domain). NOT for list-specific fields like Status.

company get.whenToUse: Get full details for a company by ID. Use --expand for list memberships.

person ls.whenToUse: List or search ALL persons in CRM. Use --query for text search (name, email). NOT for list-specific fields.

person get.whenToUse: Get full details for a person by ID. Use --expand for list memberships.

opportunity ls.whenToUse: List opportunities. Note: opportunities exist only within a specific list (pipeline).

opportunity get.whenToUse: Get opportunity details. Use --expand people/companies for associations.

field ls.whenToUse: See what custom fields exist on a list. Helps understand available filter fields.

interaction ls.whenToUse: List interactions for an entity. Requires --type, one entity selector (--person-id, --company-id, or --opportunity-id), and a date range (--days N or --after). Auto-chunks ranges > 1 year.

interaction create.whenToUse: Log a meeting, call, or email. Requires --type and --participants.

note create.whenToUse: Add a note to an entity. Simpler than interactions for quick notes.

reminder ls.whenToUse: List reminders. Filter by entity (--person-id, --company-id, --opportunity-id), user (--owner-id, --creator-id), type, status, or due date range (--due-after/--due-before).
